meaningMnemonic: <radical>Compare</radical> a <radical>building</radical> to some <radical>dirt</radical> and you'll see the difference between you and His and Her <kanji>Highness</kanji>. You live outside and sleep on the dirt. But His and Her Highness both live in a huge building.
readingMnemonic: I bet His <kanji>Highness</kanji> has never had to sleep in <reading>hay</reading> (へい) either, like you do every night. Hay is what you use as a pillow, mattress, blanket. Basically hay and dirt are all you have. Unlike His Highness.
